casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Connie Prentice REAVES. No. 225P15-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Narcisa Woods, Raleigh, for State of North Carolina. Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Connie Prentice Reaves, Spruce Pine, for Reaves, Connie Prentice. Jon David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of November 2015 by Defendant for Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
